availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward W. Turner (Madison County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Turney and Jane Turner. Resident of Madison County in 1850. Attorney in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 250A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 143.
Find A Grave, “Edward W. Turner (1830-1883)” Memorial #37596085, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/37596085 (Accessed February 12, 2017)
